Uses of Package
org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.cassandra.type.impl

  • Packages that use org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.cassandra.type.impl 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.cassandra.type.impl  
  • Classes in org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.cassandra.type.impl used by org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.cassandra.type.impl 
    Class and Description
    BufferingGridTypeDescriptor
    Cassandra doesn't do byte[] or BLOB, but it does have equivalent support through use of ByteBuffer, so we convert as needed.
    CassandraCalendarDateType
    Cassandra doesn't do Calendar, but it does do Date, so convert them.
    CassandraCalendarType
    Cassandra doesn't do Calendar, but it does do Date, so convert them.
    CassandraCharacterType
    Cassandra doesn't do Character, so convert to String.
    CassandraDateType
    Starting with 2.2 cassandra has a native 'date' (with no time part) cql column type.
    CassandraPrimitiveByteArrayType
    Handle byte[] via Cassandra's ByteBuffer support.
    CassandraTimeType
    Starting with 2.2 cassandra has a native 'time' (with no days) cql column type.
    CassandraTrueFalseType
    Maps Boolean to T or F strings, as Cassandra doesn't store Characters.
    CassandraUuidType
    Maps UUID to Cassandra's native uuid type.
    CassandraYesNoType
    Maps Boolean to Y or N strings, as Cassandra doesn't store Characters.
    DateGridTypeDescriptor
    cql's 'date' type stores days (with no time part) via the driver's LocalDate class, so we translate accordingly.
    TimeGridTypeDescriptor
    cql's 'time' type stores nanos from midnight, so we translate accordingly.
